attributes.action: Step down as prime minister or call a general election now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We belive that under Gordon Browns leadership, the public have lost confidence in both the Labour party and Gordon Brown himself.
Since becoming PM the country has been faced with scandal after scandal, recession, unemployment and an all time low in the countries morale.
I ask that he either step down and allow someone more suitable to run the country or call a general election to allow another party to put the country out of the dire situation it currently faces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
